data.comment: The first-half is under way at Deepdale - Sheffield Wed kick-off to start the match.
Josh Windass (Sheffield Wed) sees red and is sent off in Preston!
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
It's Preston with the kick-off after the break.
Alex Neil (Preston) is making a first substitution, with Paul Gallagher replacing Brad Potts.
In the minute 46, Jayden Stockley is replacing Joe Rafferty for the home team.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Tom Barkhuizen.
Joey Pelupessy is on a sub for Massimo Luongo for Sheffield Wed.
In the minute 72, Sean Maguire is replacing Emil Riis Jakobsen for Preston at Deepdale.
Alex Neil is making the team's fourth substitution at Deepdale with Ben Pearson replacing Ryan Ledson.
The away team have replaced Moses Odubajo with Jordan Rhodes. This is the second substitution made today by Tony Pulis.
In the minute 80, The away team have replaced Callum Paterson with Isaiah Brown. This is the third substitution made today by Tony Pulis.
Joost van Aken for Sheffield Wed has been booked by David Webb and receives a first yellow card.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
